name: Bob's Monday Morning
description:
Bob's Monday Morning Routine is as stable as usual, battling with drowsiness， grabbing any clothes around and trying to stay neat and organized. However, so many traps are buried along the routine, triggering unexpected accidents. Can you， the spiritual avatar that exist inside Bob's mind, help him pass through the unstable morning rush?

Instructions:

Move: WASD

Dash: Space

Shoot Hook: Left mouse button

Credits：

Ruofu Sun

Zhicheng Huang

Jingyi Nong

Xiaofei Liu
